title: Thai regulator blocks $4 billion sale of Engie's Glow to PTT
body: BANGKOK Thailand's energy regulator has blocked PTT Pcl's  bid to acquire power firm Glow Energy  from France's Engie  for up to $4 billion  in what would have been the country's largest investment deal this year.
